articles.title: U.S. FBI calls 'anomalous health incidents' a top priority - Reuters
articles.description: The U.S. Federal Bureau of Investigation said on Wednesday the issue of "anomalous health incidents" - widely known as Havana Syndrome - is a top priority and it will continue to investigate the cause of such incidents and how to protect staff.

articles.title: Polish police reports two incidents on Belarus border - Reuters
articles.description: Polish authorities stopped two groups of migrants from crossing the border from Belarus late on Thursday, private broadcaster TVN24 quoted local police as saying, marking a relatively quieter day in a week of tense confrontations.

articles.title: Banks ordered to promptly flag cybersecurity incidents under new rule - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. banking regulators finalized a rule on Thursday that directs banks to report any major cybersecurity incidents to the government within 36 hours of discovery.
